multiTurnOrders.title: Multi-turn orders
multiTurnOrders.description: Toggling this setting on will enable you to issue orders that the game will remember and implement from one turn to the next. These multi-turn orders can span up to 10 turns of movement, and cover location orders like Move as well as target orders like Seek.

edgePanning.title: Edge Panning
edgePanning.description: Enable panning when mouse reaches screen edges (PC).

useTouchControls.title: Use Touch Controls
useTouchControls.description: If enabled, it will use controls as if it were a touch device. If not enabled, it will use controls as if it were a PC.

allowTouchSelectionBox.title: Allow Touch Selection Box
allowTouchSelectionBox.description: Enable selection boxes on touch devices to select multiple units at once.

smartCurvedMovements.title: Smart Curved Movements
smartCurvedMovements.description: Enable this option to optimize movement paths with smooth curves, minimizing speed loss during rotations.

openSelectOrderModal.title: Open Select Order Modal
openSelectOrderModal.description: Enable this option to show a modal for selecting orders during gameplay.

openSelectFormationModal.title: Open Select Formation Modal
openSelectFormationModal.description: Enable this option to show a modal for selecting formations during gameplay.

cinematicMode.title: Cinematic Mode
cinematicMode.description: Hides the turn indicator, victory bar and unit bars from replays for a cleaner viewing experience.

hidePlayerInfo.title: Hide Player Info
hidePlayerInfo.description: Hides ELO and usernames from the game UI, making players anonymous.

smartReplayCamera.title: Smart Replay Camera
smartReplayCamera.description: Enable the spectator camera to automatically focus on the action during replays.

shadows.title: Shadows
shadows.description: Enables shadows on units. This may require the game to pass turn for the units to update.

showCollisionShapes.title: Show collision shapes
showCollisionShapes.description: Shows collision shapes on units. This may require the game to pass turn for the units to update.

disableSkins.title: Disable Skins
disableSkins.description: Disable unit skins and show default ones.

fullScreen.title: Full Screen
fullScreen.description: Toggle full screen mode for the application

resetSettings.title: Reset Settings
resetSettings.description: Restore all settings to their default values. This action will overwrite any customizations you have made.

tierRequirement.title: Tier Requirement
tierRequirement.settingRequires: {{setting}} is only available for {{tier}} tier players
tierRequirement.description: Upgrade your tier on Patreon to access this setting and other premium features!

disableDrawLines.title: Disable Draw Lines
disableDrawLines.description: When enabled, always use draw path formation (draw lines disabled). When disabled, use draw line formation when dragging with multiple units.

fogOfWar.description: Fog of war is the shadow that appears over terrain that your units cannot see. The computational overhead of checking every tile a player can see is costly, so disabling this option may improve performance. However, this option is 100% graphical; disabling it will not make hidden enemy units visible.

groundQuality.title: Ground Quality
groundQuality.description: Controls the quality of ground textures. Higher quality provides better visual detail but may impact performance. Requires refreshing the map.
